short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently analyze Facebook friends and remove inactive ones with simplicity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove Inactive Friends for Facebookâ„¢ is a browser extension that simplifies the process of removing inactive friends from your Facebook account. Easily analyze the activity of each friend, assign activity scores, and sort them accordingly. With just one click, you can effortlessly delete inactive friends. The extension also provides convenient friend export and offers customizable configurations. Optimize your Facebook network by using FB Friend Cleaner to manage your friend list effectively.

1. Sync all friends in bulk
2. Sync all posts with reactions, comments and sharepost in bulk
3. Remove inactive friends in bulk
4. Exports removed friends with one click

Enhance your online presence and foster new connections effortlessly. Get ready to transform your Facebook experience with our sophisticated social networking tool. Be sure to grab this essential Facebook friend-adding extension that brings simplicity and efficiency to your digital social life!

Instagram Host Permission Description:
This extension utilizes the GraphQL API to retrieve reactions data for each post (improved stability). To ensure the proper functioning of the GraphQL API, this extension requires permission from https://instagram.com to authorize the operations of GraphQL interface requests.

If you need to subscribe to our service, we will collect your email address to verify your subscription status. (We only collect this data from subscribers; if you do not subscribe, we will not collect any of your data.) This is our privacy policy.
https://esuit.dev/privacy-policy

Notice: this extension has In-App Purchases.
This extension includes features that require payment to unlock unlimited usage. Please refer to our pricing page for more details.
https://esuit.dev/pricing/remove-inactive-friends-facebook

Additional Features:
In the Popup, we provide the following additional features:

Function Description: A brief description accompanied by a video tutorial demonstrating how to use this extension.
Login Button: Use when you need to subscribe to premium features or log in with an existing subscription.
Relevant-Ext: We provide brief recommendations and introductions to relevant extensions in a small section.
